'''Sweet Summer''', also known as '''''Minecraft'' x Justice Sweet Summer Skin Pack''', is a [[skin pack]] that includes 15 skins themed around candy. It is available through a promo code obtained by purchasing a product from the "Minecraft x Justice" collection at ''Walmart'' before September 1, 2024.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.walmart.com/shop/col/minecraft-x-justice|title=Minecraft x Justice|website=Walmart.com}}</ref> The promo codes were redeemable until October 26, 2024.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.walmart.com/cp/minecraft-promo/1685719|title=Minecraft Promo|website=Walmart.com}}</ref>
